faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Find quick and easy answers to the questions you may have about our services.

faqs.question: Is Sector 16-17 Hisar a good area to buy a shop?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 16-17 is a well-developed commercial area with strong connectivity and steady business activity, making it suitable for shop investments.

faqs.question: What types of businesses work well in Sector 16-17?
faqs.answer: Retail shops, offices, clinics, coaching centres, and service outlets perform well in this area.

faqs.question: Which plot size is best for small businesses?
faqs.answer: 4 Marla and 6 Marla shop plots are ideal for small and medium-sized businesses.

faqs.question: Is Sector 16-17 suitable for rental income?
faqs.answer: Yes, consistent commercial demand supports stable rental returns.

faqs.question: Are large commercial plots available here?
faqs.answer: Yes, 8 to 14 Marla shop plots are available in selected locations.

faqs.question: Is resale value strong in Sector 16-17 Hisar?
faqs.answer: Due to high demand and limited supply, resale value remains stable.

faqs.question: Do banks provide loans for shop purchases?
faqs.answer: Most banks offer commercial property loans subject to eligibility.

faqs.question: Does Deal Acres verify shop listings?
faqs.answer: Yes, all listings are verified for ownership and accuracy.

faqs.question: Can shops be used for office purposes?
faqs.answer: Yes, many shops in Sector 16-17 are suitable for professional office use.

faqs.question: How can I get expert help to buy a shop?
faqs.answer: You can use the contact section to connect with experienced property experts.
